section.text: *NOTE: This section was repealed by emergency legislation that will expire on April 10, 2023. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation affecting this section, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: DCPS budget.

annotations.annotation: as added Feb. 22, 2014, D.C. Law 20-87, § 4(c), 61 DCR 309
For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 4092 of the Fiscal Year 2016 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-127, July 27, 2015, 62 DCR 10201).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of the At-Risk Funding Emergency Amendment Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-13, Mar. 26, 2015, 62 DCR 3841, 21 DCSTAT 840).
For temporary (225 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of the At-Risk Funding Temporary Amendment Act of 2015 (D.C. Law 21-7, June 4, 2015, 62 DCR 4564).
The 2015 amendment by D.C. Law 21-36 rewrote (b)(1); and repealed (b)(2).
The 2014 amendment by D.C. Law 20-87 added this section.
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 4003(e) of Fiscal Year 2020 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-91, July 22, 2019, 66 DCR 8497).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 4003(e) of Fiscal Year 2020 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-112, Sept. 4, 2019, 66 DCR 11964).

For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of District of Columbia Public Schools 2021-2022 Funding Stabilization Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-92, May 26, 2021, 68 DCR 005858).
For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 203 of Schools First in Budgeting Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-722, Jan. 10, 2023, 0 DCR 0).
